projects.title: Homey Goat Miniature Painting Studio
projects.body: Responsive Web Design built with Vue.js Composition API incorporating Vue Routing for and Pinia state management. Includes simple administration panel connected with Firebase Firestore, Storage and Authentication. Smooth transitions, animations supported with gsap, and clean and neat design provides very good users experience.
projects.technologies: Vue.js, Pinia,  Firebase, Sass, JavaScript, Gsap, Vuelidate

projects.title: Anime App
projects.body: Responsive Vue.js SPA app using the Composition API, which integrates an Anime DB API. It allows users to search for anime titles, view details on specific anime, and create their own anime list. The app utilizes routing to provide a seamless user experience.
projects.technologies: Vue.js, JavaScript, API, Sass, Responsive Design
